Some boa___ are us__ with a stylus i_ the sa__ way a_ a grap____ tablet, others c__ be us__ by touc____ the sur____ with a finger. They can be wall-mounted or can be mounted in a portable frame.
data.fullContent: An interactive whiteboard works like a large graphics tablet, except much larger and usually used in conjunction with a projector to overlay the user's screen onto the device's surface. Some boards are used with a stylus in the same way as a graphics tablet, others can be used by touching the surface with a finger. They can be wall-mounted or can be mounted in a portable frame.
data.answer: 交互式白板的工作原理就像一个大型的图形平板，只不过要大得多，而且通常与投影仪一起使用，将用户的屏幕覆盖在设备的表面上。一些板子可以像使用图形平板一样使用触控笔，另一些板子则可以用手指触摸板子表面。它们可以安装在墙上，也可以安装在便携式框架中。
